metadata.title: CVE-2017-0396 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in visualizer/EffectVisualizer.cppin libeffects in Mediaserver could enable a local malicious application toaccess data outside of its permission levels. This issue is rated asModerate because it could be used to access sensitive data withoutpermission. Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1,7.0, 7.1. Android ID: A-31781965.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
